metadata.title: CVE-2024-7522 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Editor code failed to check an attribute value. This could have led to anout-of-bounds read. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 129, Firefox ESR <115.14, Firefox ESR < 128.1, Thunderbird < 128.1, and Thunderbird < 115.14.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
